title: The Lego Batman Movie
description: Batman works with a team to defeat the Joker and save Gotham City.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is offered a chance to have his past crimes forgiven, as payment for planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who accomplishes incredible things in his life and meets historical figures along the way.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Braveheart
description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: During the Normandy Invasion of World War II, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his mob partners over a period of 25 years.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile.

title: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a mischievous god and an alien invasion that threatens humanity.

title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
description: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker's secret identity is exposed, bringing him, his friends, and his loved ones into grave danger.

title: The Social Network
description: Mark Zuckerberg creates Facebook and is later sued by twins who claim he stole their idea and by a co-founder who was later squeezed out.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the actions of Thanos and restore balance to the universe.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
